statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, support_rating, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '22b2f4ee-0ff4-4e68-9464-79754c268b6b';
SELECT feedback_id, support_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE support_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE support_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, support_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks, AVG(support_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 2 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT support_rating, customer_id, comments FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM support_services WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE support_rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE support_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, support_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_feedback WHERE support_rating = 5;
SELECT AVG(support_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, support_rating AS rating, comments FROM customer_feedback WHERE support_rating < 3 AND feedback_id != 10 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE service_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, service_rating, feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT support_id, service_category, support_agent_id FROM ServiceSupport WHERE support_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, overall_rating, customer_comment FROM CustomerRating WHERE overall_rating < 4 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE service_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(service_rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM ServiceSupport WHERE support_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT support_id, service_category, support_agent_id FROM ServiceSupport WHERE service_category = 'Technical Support';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE service_rating > 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_department DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM support_agents WHERE agent_department = 'IT' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT t.ticket_id, c.customer_name, a.agent_name FROM support_tickets t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN support_agents a ON t.agent_id = a.agent_id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, support_service FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM SupportServices ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM SupportServices WHERE service_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM SupportServices WHERE service_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM Ratings ORDER BY stars DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
